title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4001.3 - Daily records to be filed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4001.3 - Daily records to be filed

State Regulations

The commission shall maintain in an adequate filing
system, records from day to day of all owners, trainers, jockeys, horses and
performances and of all applicants for licenses and such other persons or class
of persons as may be specified by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4001.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
